# False Bay Watershed Water Quality Monitoring

```{r echo=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

theme_set(theme_classic())
```

## Data
Load raw water quality data
```{r}
qual <- read.csv("../Data/FBWS_water_quality_monitoring.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

Data management
```{r echo=FALSE}
qual$sample_date <- as.POSIXct(qual$sample_date, format = "%m/%d/%Y")
```

## Sample Locations
![](../Data/FB_monitoring plan_v2.png)

## Trends

Temperature
```{r echo=FALSE}
ggplot(qual) +
  geom_point(aes(x = sample_date, y = temp_c, color = station_id), size = 1.75) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1") +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(10, 25), breaks = seq(10, 25, by = 2))
```

Dissolved oxygen
```{r echo=FALSE}
ggplot(qual) +
  geom_point(aes(x = sample_date, y = DO_mgL, color = station_id), size = 1.75) +
  scale_color_brewer(palette = "Set1")  +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 18), breaks = seq(0, 18, by = 2))
```
